title: my post was taken down for politics????? and sex??????
body:
man i just made a harmless and wholesome meme of swain saying "gay rights" because imagine swain being a soft boy. just imagine it. how does that have anything to do with that for hecks sakes yall made varus two gay boys and a darkin i dont think this makes a lot of sense for you guys to take something like that down :/ like i love yall but this is ridiculous it wasnt intended to be about politics or sexual/nsfw things it was about the hilarious thought of this just generally thought to be evil dude who leads the most hated country saying that he supports gay rights thats ironic and funny to me i???
the intention was funny meme...........

replies.body:
While the post may not have been intended to be about politics or sexuality, it included some bits that took it well outside acceptable meme boundaries.

>inb4 someone who doesn't understand ironic "gay rights" or "this character is gay haha lol" memes says something like "uh actually? in the lore on page 4835783475 of the book of,, noxus,,,,, swain said he hated the gays"

^This right here is basically inviting discussion of "ironic gay rights" and, further, is boiling "this character is gay" into a joke. While I appreciate that may not have been your intent, ultimately the way a thread comes across matters more to us (in terms of what content is/isn't allowed) than the manner in which it was intended.

Further, other lines in the thread were also not acceptable. Take the following comment of yours:

>icant believe you guys hate the gays

Again, while it seems from context that you meant that in a humorous manner, it's a type of humor that we don't allow on the boards.

yea i guess i didnt see that most normies wouldn't get my type of humor, the whole post was based off of this meme here: http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--64tog8FAZo/U_WxdyiaS8I/AAAAAAAAXEM/2LUrkRG3PDg/w1200-h630-p-k-no-nu/Bvgo3jQIgAAOzDH.jpg 
and saying "i cant believe you guys hate the gays" in response to getting a few downvotes was an obvious hyperbole,i guess ill stick to deep fried and surreal memes those cant hurt nobody
take this last part with a grain of salt but i think some people thought swain saying gay rights was bad because hes like seen as evil or bad???? idk man
RIP Meme, cant risk offending anyone with humor.

I just recently had my posts removed because of comments that were "borderline" according to some moderator. I did not insult anyone or anything. It was a bit of a heated discussion, but no insults were tossed out. My god have people gotten soft. Can't say anything these days without people (or some moderator) getting all social justice-esque on you. Pretty ridiculous times.
